title: Great Pub
text: Great for a casual beer or wine, food tasty, broad menu and good service, lovely decor as well. recommended

title: Tremendous
text: Tremendous dining experience in a wonderful setting, take your time and dont rush when dining here, recommended.

title: Great share plates
text: Great concept, broad share plates, small well decorated space, service was swift. Food was delicious, do book ahead as they turned lots of people away as the venue was full!

title: Exceptional and great value
text: Exceptional, very engaged young team, food was tasty and ample in portions, wine selected by the staff was excellent too. A trendy modern venue to match the cuisine!

title: A real once in a lifetime experience
text: You cannot visit Athens without stepping onto this sacred site. Get in early to avoid the long lines, book a tour if you can!

title: Must See
text: Must See, get in nice and early to avoid the massive crowds, we booked a private tour which was excellent. Allow about 2 hours.
